name: @mvp/chrome-extension
description: Chrome extension to automatically save generated images from Midjourney

scripts.build: echo 'Chrome extension build - no build step needed'
scripts.dev: echo 'Chrome extension dev - load as unpacked extension'
scripts.validate: echo 'Validating manifest...' && node -e 'JSON.parse(require("fs").readFileSync("manifest.json"))' && echo 'Manifest is valid JSON'
